title: Pre-populate test credentials on Firebase OTP login screen

requirements.summary: Pre-populate phone number and OTP input fields with test credentials using React state initializers
acceptanceCriteria: When the login screen loads, the phone number input field displays '+911234567890' as its initial value.
When the login screen loads, the OTP input field displays '123456' as its initial value.
The pre-populated values are set via React state initializers (e.g. useState('+911234567890') and useState('123456')), not hardcoded as HTML attributes only.
The Send OTP and Verify buttons continue to function correctly using the pre-populated values.
All existing login/logout/auto-login behavior remains intact.

file_operations.description: Modify the React state initializers for the phone number and OTP input fields to pre-populate with test credentials. Change the useState hooks for phone number to initialize with '+911234567890' and OTP to initialize with '123456'. Ensure the existing Firebase OTP authentication flow, localStorage auto-login (zweetiUser check on mount), logout function, and all other billing/sales features remain unchanged.
